data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Jhalokati, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jhalokati, Barisal, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Jhalokati access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary: On average, 144 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Jhalokati, Barisal, Bangladesh.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Jhalokati.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Jhalokati
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Khandait people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Khandait people.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Jhalokati, Barisal, Bangladesh.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Jhalokati, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Jhalokati words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

location.name: Jhalokati
location.people_groups_list: Nikari (Muslim traditions), Jat (Muslim traditions), Mallik (Hindu traditions), Mandala (Hindu traditions), Nai Nabasakh
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nikari (Muslim traditions) (54,000), Jat (Muslim traditions) (4,100), Mallik (Hindu traditions) (200), Mandala (Hindu traditions) (7,700), Nai Nabasakh (6,900)
